text: Holy Smoke! is a 1999 American Australian drama movie directed by Jane Campion and starring Kate Winslet, Harvey Keitel, Sophie Lee, Daniel Wyllie, Pam Grier. It was distributed by Miramax Films. ==Other websites== * * Category:1999 drama movies Category:1999 LGBT movies Category:American drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Australian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Jane Campion
title: Holy Smoke
